alert.note: Alert for Taylor (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 22 at 6:55AM EDT until June 22 at 7:45AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Taylor County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 745 AM EDT. * At 655 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 17 miles southwest of Perry, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Pinland, Dekle Beach, Jug Island, Jack Lee Island, Keaton Beach, Bird Island, Salem, Blue Springs, Carbur, Athena, Cedar Island and Adams Beach. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
